declare @rate numeric(16, 5), @$r1 numeric(13,3), @$r2 numeric(13,3), @$uom nvarchar(33), @environmentAmount numeric(19, 2), @environmentPercent numeric(5, 2) if exists(select 1 from dmqddvt where dvt = @dvt and (ma_vt = @ma_vt or ma_vt = '*')) begin
select top 1 @$uom = dvt, @environmentAmount = muc_thue, @environmentPercent = ty_le from dmkbtmt where ma_vt = @ma_vt and ngay_hl <= @$ngay_lct and status = 1 and loai = '1' order by ngay_hl desc select @$r1 = case when @$uom = @dvt then 1 when @$uom is null then 0 end if @$r1 is null and @$uom is not null begin if exists(select 1 from dmqddvt where dvt = @$uom and ma_vt = @ma_vt) begin select @$r1 = he_so from dmqddvt where dvt = @$uom and ma_vt = @ma_vt select @$r2 = he_so from dmqddvt where dvt = @dvt and ma_vt = @ma_vt select @$r1 = he_so / @$r1 * @$r2 from dmqddvt where xtype = 'S' and ma_vt = @ma_vt and @$r1 <> 0 end end
select @rate = he_so from dmqddvt where dvt = @dvt and (ma_vt = @ma_vt or ma_vt = '*') select isnull(@rate, 1) as he_so, isnull(@$r1, 0) as he_so_mt, isnull(@environmentAmount, 0) as muc_thue, isnull(@environmentPercent, 0) as tl_chiu_thue return end
